result.formatted_address: 15 Walnut Rd, South Hamilton, MA 01982, USA

reviews.text: I go to this special restaurant every couple of days  as I love the special air that is exist in this restaurant. The staff is extraordianrillyremarkably welcoming and well trained. The service is pretty quick. Not to mention, the food they prepare is highly distinguished. I have been there more than once and I was always happy. The expense is decent. I highly suggest this restaurant to my friends and family.
Great first experience. Yum food,  plenty on the menu to tempt you. Awesome cocktails. Staff attentive and engaging. We will be back.

We came in with 11 people and no reservations, the staff was so accommodating and friendly. The food was great and the specialty drinks as well. We also had 4 young kids with us, the staff gave them their own booth and treated them like adults, taking their orders, it was very sweet.  I'd definitely go again and would reccomend you do!

I dine in this great spot often! This is my favorite place to have a bite.  I go there routinely. The meals are great, the workers are helpful and the rates are decent. I enjoy eating in this place over a nice lunch.

Great place for a drink and for dinner.  You have to try the mussels with the white wine broth.  Amazing.  I found myself drinking the broth after a healthy portion of mussels.   Service and staff is great.
